project_descr: The Post-Matthew Recovery Programme aims to create conditions for long-term recovery, resilience to multiple shocks and sustainable development, while meeting the immediate needs in the affected region to kick-start recovery.

outputs.output_descr: National and local capacities for, planning, management, monitoring and evaluation of post-Matthew recovery efforts enhanced
Productive and human capacities and livelihoods opportunities restored for early recovery of affected communities
donor_name: UNITED NATIONS DEVELOPMENT FUND FOR WOME

outputs.output_descr: Communities supported in longer-term recovery efforts, ensuring greater resilience to climate and disaster risks
